description: An XML-based map of the content in a native binary HDF4 file. designed to serve an archival purpose as a companion to the binary file.  The primary target audience for HDF4 File Content Maps is a person twenty or more years in the future is interested in the content originally stored in the companion binary HDF4 files.
name: HDF4 File Content Map

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
